title: Episode 48: Men: 44, Women: 0
description: A century after women won the vote in the US, we still see very few of them in leadership roles. Researchers say women are trapped in a catch-22 known as "the double bind." Note: an early version of this episode incorrectly stated that Carol Moseley Braun was the first African-American U.S. Senator. She was in fact the first female African-American Senator.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
